extendedInfo.description: Wish l!st is your personal wishlist companion. The app allows you to manage all the items you want to buy by adding them to your wishlist. Wish l!st is great while shopping by always having your wishlist with you.With the gift list feature you can mark items as gift idea and share your gift list with your friends, family or maybe Santa. This makes Wish l!st the ideal app for creating a Christmas list, birthday list or any other special events. Wish l!st can sort your items by fields like category, priority or price. You can also track your purchased items in the purchased list for a overview of your spending's in the past.Most important features:- Manage items in your wishlist.- Stores related information like price, priority and comments.- Add pictures to your wish list items.- Purchased history.- Quick item overview.- Sorting by category, title, price or priority.- Customizable categories list.- Subtotals.- Share your gift list with your friends.- Backup/Restore to SD.- Full language support for: English, Dutch, German"Wish l!st free | Wish list app is a simple tool that allows users to manage their wish list easily.  - Editor's Pick from AppEggs.com""An excellent app -  Editor's Choice from DroidAppOfTheDay.com"

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Perfect for Just a simple list of future buys. Wish it had a place for the store to get it, maybe a barcode feature and multiplied the cost for you when you put in the quantity. But its awesome!!
reviews.author: Cassie Marion

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Good app and easy to use,  2 more things for 5 star for me: 1. Option to view list in gallery style view with pictures 2. Hyperlink field to link directly to a store
reviews.author: Jason Brincat

reviews.title: Cannot export list
reviews.comment: Q:  How do I highlight and send the whole list?  A: Try the help section, oohhhhh wait, there isn\'t one  Now I have to copy down entire list again and email.  What a rip!!!!
reviews.author: Lisa Van beusekom

reviews.title: Very nice!
reviews.comment: Good design, very functional. Feature request: expand all categories toggle please!
reviews.author: Vishaal Mehrishi

reviews.title: Good. But unappealing thumbnail
reviews.comment: Unappealing thumbnail and list. It would be better if the thumbnail have a picture of the wishlist.
reviews.author: mevlied nahla

reviews.title: Location item?
reviews.comment: Could be better if add wishlist location item
reviews.author: Suzy \'D

reviews.title: I like it but...
reviews.comment: I like this app but I wish you could list items by store rather than category, this way when you go to the mall, you know what to buy when you go to each store and don\'t forget anything.
reviews.author: Jessica Falcone

reviews.comment: Works well for several occasions Thumbs up!
reviews.author: Kaila Reinhardt

reviews.title: Nice!!
reviews.comment: I use this tool as wishlist and partly as a financial planner. This comes handy whenever I think of buying an unexpected thing. I like this!!!!
reviews.author: Vignesh Ramalingam

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I wish next release will support comparison between multi items. Thank you very much
reviews.author: Le Anh Tuan

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Its a good app but its not really a wish list and you cant share or send it to anyone. Also you have to choose a category for your present and they dont have all categories listed.
reviews.author: Eleanor Blomfield

reviews.title: Brilliant.
reviews.comment: It\'s a Wish List. What can you complain about ? Well designed & easy to use.
reviews.author: Shuraragi Ko

reviews.title: Free
reviews.comment: I would\'ve gave it 5* if the App didn\'t have free in the title its better off without it
reviews.author: Gennette Guzman

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: This app is so handy. I can keep track of the items I wish to purchase for loved ones, and make a list of things I want.
reviews.author: Jessica Bailey

reviews.comment: THE DEVELOERS OF THIS APL SUCK!!! They don\'t respond emails @ all <OR> address your issues with their app... A [LOW VISION] USERS NEED NOT BOTHER!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic app
reviews.comment: Absolutely handy and such a nice thing to do.  Thank god it doesn\'t try to sell you anything.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Nice application and interface. Is there a paid version with no adverts? They get in the way
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It\'s perfect
reviews.comment: Helps to organize my wishes, so that I can plan my budget and priorities. Really helpful for me since I love to shop too much and usually buy something not necessary
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: need upgrade
reviews.comment: useful!! but need upgrade. i can\'t find a way to change currency, i need it in IDR (indonesian rupiah). and it also great if we can attach picture and an extimation date we wish to buy it. like \'next month\'  nice apps though :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Not that great
reviews.author: A Google User
